paragraphs: The Archives fade behind you as a new passage opens—not carved, not grown, but *written* into being. Steps of crystallized ink spiral downward into light that is neither warm nor cold, simply *present*.

The space expands around you, vast beyond comprehension. An endless stage stretches in every direction, its floor polished to mirror-perfection. Above, rigging of impossible complexity supports curtains the color of twilight. Fly systems rise into darkness without ceiling.
This is the Mainstage. The heart of the Understage. Where every story begins.
In the center distance, a single figure stands. The Editor. They do not turn to face you—they have no need. They know you have arrived. They have been waiting.
The air thrums with potential. Your alliances, your choices, every faction you have aligned with or against—they all lead here. The final act approaches.
There is no turning back. The curtain waits.

npcs.name: The Editor
npcs.description: The architect of the Great Revision, standing at the heart of the Mainstage
